articles.author: John Schuhmann
articles.title: Knicks-Pacers: 5 takeaways as New York leans on defense to force Game 6 - NBA
articles.description: New York's defense plays desperate, the Brunson-Towns duo continues to cook and Indiana comes up empty in Game 5.
articles.content:
Jalen Brunson scores 32 points on 12-of-18 shooting and New York staves off elimination in Game 5 of the Eastern Conference Finals.
NEW YORK  The New York Knicks defended like their season was on th… [+8159 chars]
